summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to compensation for City Councilmembers; clarifying the salary for Councilmember, effective January 1, 1996, shall remain at the salary currently received by Councilmembers whose terms began January 1, 1994; and amending Ordinance No. 117479 to add "Councilmember" to the list of positions excepted from the cost of living (COLA) salary increases effective December 28, 1994, December 27, 1995, and January 8, 1997.
